standards.integrity: System files, manifests, and seals validated. No mismatches detected.
standards.telemetry: Heartbeat, sync, and integrity telemetry in continuous operation.
standards.audit: Audit logs preserved. Chain of custody intact.
standards.governance: Policy engine active. Decision matrix operational.
standards.runtime: Node and PowerShell runtimes verified and functional.

evidence.manifests: All Phase manifests present and validated.
evidence.seals: Phase seals verified across versions 0 to 9.
evidence.telemetry: Heartbeat and integrity files updated and valid.
evidence.auditLogs: Evolution log and assembly logs archived.
evidence.registry: System registry and capability files in place and valid.

riskStatus.explanation: No faults, corruptions, missing files, or unresolved inconsistencies detected.
mitigations: Integrity seal verification on every update.

operationalReadiness.notes: WyneOS v1.0 is ready for controlled deployment within WFSL and SAS-CIC environments.
